org.xchain.namespaces.core

Class EvalCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.namespaces.core.EvalCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    @Element(localName="eval")
public abstract class EvalCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command

    The eval command will evaluate an xpath expression. <xchain:eval xmlns:xchain="http://www.xchain.org/core/1.0" expression="/some/xpath"/>

    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett, Josh Kennedy
